Two reports: one by George Washington University Associate Professor John Sides and another by UMass Amherst Political Science Professor Brian Schaffner, found that the actual figure is around 9 percent, not 30 percent.
Durbin: s office did not provide any evidence or sources to support his claim of 30 percent.
The experts: research and analysis, based on surveys and data, contradicted Durbin's claim and supported the lower figure of 9 percent.
